name: io.github.MIt9/comfy-ui-builder
title: ComfyUI Builder
description: ComfyUI MCP server: knowledge base, workflow builder, real-time execution, models, plugins.

environmentVariables.name: COMFYUI_HOST
environmentVariables.description: ComfyUI API URL (e.g. http://127.0.0.1:8188). Required for execution, queue, outputs.

environmentVariables.name: COMFYUI_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to ComfyUI install. Required for install_custom_node, install_model.

environmentVariables.name: COMFYUI_KNOWLEDGE_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Path to knowledge directory (default: package knowledge/). Use when MCP runs from different cwd.
